item.title: What is Soliloquy?
item.description: Soliloquy refers to the act of speaking one’s thoughts aloud, whether alone or in the presence of others. It’s a technique often used by characters in plays to convey their innermost emotions and ideas. Now, I’m excited to share that I’ve developed a new mobile application that can help you learn foreign languages by speaking! If you’re interested in trying the beta version of the app, please sign up for our waiting list by clicking here: join waiting list !

item.title: Learn a foreign language in 1 year - The Soliloquy approach
item.description: Remember those times when you were about to talk to someone in a different language, but you were so nervous and stressed that you couldn’t speak. Whereas, in your head, you can even think in a different language, or you can understand a vast amount of videos you watch on the internet. But you still have difficulty speaking. I’ve experienced that too, more than I can count. Whether it was back in high school facing that final English exam, or even at work, trying to talk to clients.
